name: Steel Racer
description:
Steel Racer is a 2D pixelated old school racing game, inspired by classics from the 80s and 90s era, featuring great chiptune music, arcade gameplay style and high speed cars!

Race through 50 different circuits along 5 racing seasons! On each season, you can choose the order of the races you want to compete! Win races and money to improve and customize your car and become a racing legend!

You'll be able to choose between 3 difficulty settings and 3 levels of traction assist, which makes your car easier or harder to control on curves, and make the game as challenging as you would like!

Are you ready to become the "Steel Racer"!?

FEATURES
- 50 different tracks;
- 5 racing seasons featuring different scenarios;
- 2D retro style graphics;
- Different items to buy and improve/customize your car;
- Great chiptune style music;
